articles.title: Watch The 'Star Trek: Discovery' Season 5 Premiere For Free On YouTube In USA - TrekMovie
articles.description: "Red Directive" available for free on same day it debuts on Paramount+
articles.content: As they do for each new season for all of their shows, Paramount+ has made the entire season 5 premiere of Star Trek: Discovery available online for free. Except this time the did it on the same day … [+1033 chars]

articles.author: Marc Malkin
articles.title: Nicholas Galitzine on ‘Mary & George’ Sex Scenes, Tom Cruise’s Influence on ‘The Idea of You’ and His Disastrous ‘Dunkirk’ Audition - Variety
articles.description: Nicholas Galitzine talks "Mary & George" sex scenes, dancing in just underwear in "The Idea of You" and what happened at his "Dunkirk" audition.
articles.content: Nicholas Galitzine may have told his parents that he has a lot of sex scenes in “Mary & George” with both women and men, but that didn’t keep things from getting awkward when his mom and dad were… [+4866 chars]
